suite.doc: This is the script for Create Sales Visit All Informations Prerequisites : Follow the steps below 1. Open user_login_resource 2. Input Username at variable ruel.arb 3. Input password at variable moaicrm 4. Input User's Full Name at variable Ruel Arbon
